medical_history.chief_complaint: Dizziness, malaise, nausea, vomiting, and dark stools.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports feeling unwell for the last week with decreased oral intake, diffuse abdominal pain, and three days of dark stool. Experienced daily hematemesis for the past 7 days. Symptoms were noted to have started at their mother's funeral, where the patient's sister observed yellowing of the eyes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Degenerative disc disease, Alcohol use disorder, Polysubstance use disorder, Cervical spinal stenosis, Gait abnormality, Muscle spasms, Essential Hypertension.
